Name: ExaLink Flagship
Rules: <u>Augmentation</u> (Whatever ~ is attached to is Augmented in addition to its other types.)\nWhen ~ enters٫ Choose a commander to attach it to.\nThat commander's owner plays with the top card of their deck revealed.
Flavor: In 2024 our first brain computer interface was implanted. By 2040 they were as ubiquitous as the smartphone.

Name: Black Alley Brain Interface
Rules: <u>Augmentation</u> (Whatever ~ is attached to is Augmented in addition to its other types.)٫ <u>Prepare 2 -- [U]</u> (Pay [U] and put ~ into your deck second from the top. When you would draw ~٫ instead deploy it without paying its cost.)\nWhen ~ enters the battlefield٫ Choose a commander to attach it to.\nThat commander's owner can't be forced to reveal cards unless the revealer pays [1] for each card.
Flavor: Links have been tapped since the 60s little lady. Sure I know how to fix that problem... for a price.

Name: Linking Ceremony
Rules: Choose a commander٫ reveal its owner's hand.
Flavor: For most people٫ their 25th birthday marks their becoming an adult. For some it's the best day of their life٫ for others not so much.

Name: Sara Anthony٫ Cyber Criminal
Rules: (Becomes `Dark Web Research` if you already control ~.) Hacker X (Whenever ~ deals damage to a commander٫ look at the top X cards of its owner's deck٫ then put one of them into your hand. X is the number of effect cards in your discard pile.) As Commander -- You maximum hand size is doubled (this applies after any fixed additions or subtractions.) As Asset -- Virus cards in your hand gain Append to Opponent's Card [X] ([X] is the card's cost.)

Name: Dark Web Research
Rules: <u>Append to Effect [I][I]</u> (You may spend [I][I] to add this card's effects to an effect on the stack. Remove its effects from that card after it has resolved.)٫ <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\nDraw a card.\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Sara Anthony٫ Cyber Criminal` back into your deck.)٫

Name: Library Study
Rules: Draw X cards (X is one plus the number of times ~ has resolved this game.)

Name: Security Black Out
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\nChoose a combatant you control٫ until end of turn٫ it gains <u>Stealth</u> (The chosen asset can't be intercepted.)

Name: Counter Hack
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\nChoose a card on the stack٫ until end of turn٫ it can't be Chosen or hacked.

Name: Hack
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\nUntil end of turn٫ whenever you hack a card send it to the top of it's owner's deck instead of to their discard.\n<u>Card Hack</u> (Choose a card on the stack٫ send it to its owner's discard pile٫ none of its effects occur.)

Name: Quicken
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\nChoose a card in your hand٫ until end of turn it gains <u>Response</u>.

Name: AI Overload
Rules: Choose an AI to be <u>Forfeit</u> (The AI's owner puts the specified asset into their discard pile.) by its owner.

Name: SQL Injection Attack
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\n<u>Card Hack</u> (Choose a card on the stack٫ send it to its owner's discard pile٫ none of its effects occur.)\n~ costs [I][I] less to cast if you didn't go first.

Name: Spy Drone
Rules: <u>Flying</u> (~ can only be intercepted by assets with ranged or flying. If ~ is intercepting you may choose another adjacent combatant or commander you control٫ that is not also intercepting٫ to take the damage instead.)\nA deck may have any number of ~s in it.
Flavor: "Mom do you think this will do the trick?" ~Jonathan Arigotti

Name: Jonathan Arigotti
Rules: (Becomes `Go Little Guy! Go!` if you already control ~.)\nDrones you control have +1/+0 and <u>Hacker 2</u> (Whenever that drone deals damage to a commander٫ look at the top two cards of its owner's deck٫ then put one of them into your hand.)
Flavor: After my best friend's dad died I convinced my parents to take her in.

Name: Go Little Guy! Go!
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\nCreate a <u>Transient</u> `Spy Drone` on the battlefield with a random effect from a revealed combatant in an opponent's hand or library.\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Jonathan Arrigotti` back into your deck.)
Flavor: "Jon if another one blows up in my face... we are finished! F I N I S H E D!" ~Sara Anthony

Name: The Day Dad Disappeared
Rules: <u>Decision</u> (You may choose one or more٫ this card's cost is the sum total of its base cost plus all decisions made.)\n-> <u>Take Him Away -- [2][O][O][+]</u> Choose an asset to remove from the game.\n-> <u>Wipe Her Mind -- [I][I][+]</u> Choose an asset to return to its owner's hand٫ remove all modifications from it.
Flavor: "Listen men٫ Keith Anthony has been deemed a threat to national security. He is to be considered armed and dangerous٫ make this mission fast and efficient! In and out before he even knows we are there." ~Lilly Coleson٫ Canadian Ministry of Truth

Name: A Job Too Risky
Rules: <u>Decision</u> (You may choose one or more٫ this card's cost is the sum total of its base cost plus all decisions made.)\n-> <u>Governmental Re-education -- [8][I][I][+]</u> Choose an asset to permanently gain control of.\n-> <u>Go After the Girl! -- [N][+]</u> Choose an asset to permanently gain <u>Sluggish</u> (That asset deals damage after other combatants.)
Flavor: The worst part was having to explain to Marina what happened to her son.

Name: Self Destructive Hacking
Rules: Whenever you resolve an effect٫ draw X cards (X is one plus the number of times ~ has seen the effect resolve.)\nWhenever you draw a card٫ your commander loses 2 morale unless you pay [N][N].
Flavor: This was too much: her mother٫ her father٫ and now her best friend.

Name: Marina Arigotti٫ Femme Fatale
Rules:
(Becomes `Marina's Charm` if you already control ~@.)
<u>Armed -- `PDW`</u> (~ enters with a `PDW` attached.)٫ <u>Graceful</u> (~@ can't be intercepted by assets with lesser Attack Power.)
When ~ enters Choose an <u>Explicitly Male</u> (It must say Male in its type.) asset to gain control of until ~ leaves.
If ~@ has a <u>Gun</u> she gets +3/+3.
Flavor: "There is no weapon more dangerous than a beautiful woman in a room full of powerful men. Well boys.. I'm here."

Name: Marina's Charm
Rules: <u>Append to Effect [M][M][M][M][M]</u> (You may spend [M][M][M][M][M] to add this card's effects to an effect on the stack. Remove its effects from that card after it has resolved.)٫ <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\nChoose a Male asset to gain control of until end of turn.\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Marina Arigotti٫ Femme Fatale` back into your deck.)
Flavor: "Sara this needs to stop! Cops where just at the door again٫ I need to see some initiative from you٫ all this hacking business needs to stop! $700... rent... its due in a week٫ or I want to see some bags..."

Name: Wealthy Connections
Rules: At the beginning of each turn create a <u>Transient</u> (If ~ would enter your discard pile٫ instead remove it from the game.) <u>Fleating</u> (Discard it at end of turn.) `Savings`.
Flavor: "...Where can you get money if you don't hack? Come now child don't cry... I might know a few ways to earn an honest living." ~Marina Arigotti

Name: Curfew
Rules: Choose an asset then return all assets with the same name to their owners' hands٫ they lose all modifications.
Flavor: "Okay Sara! Time for bed! Be sure to put all your toys away" ~Keith Anthony

Name: Prototype Autonomous Humanoid Assault Drone Mark V
Rules: (Becomes `Mark V Detonation` if you already control ~.)\n<u>Flying</u> (~ can only be intercepted by assets with ranged or flying. If ~ is intercepting you may choose another adjacent combatant or commander you control٫ that is not also intercepting٫ to take the damage instead.)\nWhen ~ leaves add [I][I][I] to your energy bank.
Flavor: The development of the Mark V was the perfect secret. And its discoverers the perfect test mission...

Name: Mark V Detonation
Rules: As an additional cost to deploy ~٫ <u>Forfeit</u> (The drone's owner puts the specified asset into their discard pile.) a drone you control.\n~ deals X damage to any target (X is the attack power of the forfeit drone.)\n(Do not shuffle another `Prototype Autonomous Humanoid Assault Drone Mark V` into your deck.)

Name: Dark Web Information Broker
Rules: Whenever you resolve a card owned by another player٫ that player's commander loses 1 morale.\nIf ~ is <u>Embodied</u> (Inside a vehicle.) that player instead loses 2 morale and you create a `Savings` in your hand.
Flavor: All the corpos want information on all the others. Information brokers make a fortune sitting in between.

Name: Ministry of Truth Enforcer
Rules: <u>Armed -- `Enigmatic Railgun`</u> (~ enters with a `Enigmatic Railgun` attached.)
Flavor: "We thoroughly searched Mr Anthony's house for information contraband. His personal computer and other devices have been confiscated. So far we have discovered no evidence of any wrongdoing..." ~Lilly Coleson٫ Arrest Report

Name: Skiddy
Rules: <u>Hacker 3</u> (Whenever ~ deals damage to a commander٫ look at the top three cards of its owner's deck٫ then put one of them into your hand.)\nAs long as you control a Hacker with greater attack power٫ ~ gains <u>Stealth</u> (~ can't be intercepted).
Flavor: Most "hackers" just use other people's scripts.
